text: Salvador Sánchez Cerén (born 18 June 1944) is a Salvadoran politician. He was the President of El Salvador from 2014 to 2019. He previously served as Vice President from 2009 to 2014. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of El Salvador Category:21st- century presidents in North America
title: Salvador Sánchez Cerén
